title: FS: Piedmont COBB - Red Port. SOLD!
author: robw1959

posts.post_title: FS: Piedmont COBB - Red Port. SOLD!
posts.post_content: SOLD - 1911 T206 authentic Piedmont tobacco baseball card of Ty Cobb. Very fine example with perfect registration and decent centering. Vibrant colors on front complement bold advertisement printing on back. No creasing, scuffing, or even print marks anywhere. Asking SOLD delivered, PayPal preferred.

For those of you who may be interested in bidding on the card, here is the eBay link, but the Buy-It-Now price is significantly lower here on Net54 . . .  [url]http://www.ebay.com/itm/222101025403?ssPageName=STRK:MESELX:IT&_trksid=p3984.m1555.l2649[/url]
